# NSTableViewDiffableDataSourceReferenceCellProvider

**Type Alias**

A closure that configures and returns a cell for a table view from its diffable data source.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias NSTableViewDiffableDataSourceReferenceCellProvider = (NSTableView, NSTableColumn, Int, Any) -> NSView
```

## Creating a Diffable Data Source

- **init(tableView:cellProvider:)**: Creates a diffable data source with the specified cell provider, and connects it to the specified table view.

items.description: Creates a diffable data source with the specified cell provider, and connects it to the specified table view.
items.name: init(tableView:cellProvider:)
